title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
description: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
OB: When invoking the New Java Package wizard, the following message appears at the top before any input is entered into the package name field: 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists'. The package name field is currently empty. The user is unsure about the meaning of this message and whether it indicates an error. It is suggested that if this is an error, the message should be displayed in red with the error icon.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Create a new Java project.
2. Select the created project.
3. Invoke the New Java Package wizard.
